title: Pico della Mirandola: Syncretism & Christian Kabbalah
description: Complete works of Giovanni Pico della Mirandola, the brilliant Renaissance polymath who attempted to synthesize all philosophical and religious traditions. His 900 Theses, Oration on the Dignity of Man, and pioneering Christian Kabbalah.

books.title: De hominis dignitate; Heptaplus; De ente et uno
books.author: Pico della Mirandola

keyWorks: Oration on the Dignity of Man: Manifesto of Renaissance humanism
900 Theses: Attempted synthesis of all philosophical traditions
Commentary on Benivieni: Treatise on Platonic love
researchValue: Pico's ambitious syncretism - attempting to reconcile Plato, Aristotle, Kabbalah, Hermeticism, and Christianity - defined Renaissance philosophy. His Christian Kabbalah influenced Reuchlin, Agrippa, and the entire esoteric tradition.
